name: repoflow
features: Repository management: Organize and track multiple Git repositories from a centralized dashboard interface.
Workflow automation: Trigger actions based on repository events like commits, pull requests, or releases.
Code review tools: Facilitate team code reviews with commenting, approval workflows, and change tracking.
Branch visualization: View branch structures and merge histories with interactive diagrams for better understanding.
CI/CD integration: Connect with build systems and deployment pipelines for automated testing and releases.
Issue tracking: Link commits and pull requests to issues for comprehensive project management visibility.
Team collaboration: Assign reviewers, set permissions, and manage access across multiple repositories.
Analytics dashboard: Monitor repository activity, contributor statistics, and code quality metrics over time.
